title: 买了个正版  有问题撒=.=
author: Ka_Ying
txt_content:
正版没有.minecraft文件夹么- -
怎么调最大内存...



 Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

求解撒~

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content: 桌面 属性 高级 疑难解答 硬件加速全开，再不行就更新显卡驱动

replies.author: EternalZZX
replies.txt_content:
没OpenGL模组，更新或重装显卡驱动即可
.minecraft文件夹在C:\Users\XXX\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft
